model.name: Finnish Traffic Insurance DMN
model.description: Hierarchical DMN business rules for Liikennevakuutuslaki (460/2016) - Negative Claims First

eligibility.description: Rules determining coverage eligibility and compensation amounts

negative_claims.description: Rules resulting in claim denial or reduction

decisions.name: E1_VehicleInsuranceRequirement
decisions.description: Determine if vehicle requires mandatory traffic insurance

decisions.name: E2_DamageCoverage
decisions.description: Determine what damage types are covered

decisions.name: E4_InsuranceObligationLiableParty
decisions.description: Determine who is liable for insurance obligation

decisions.name: N1_UntitledUse
decisions.description: Unauthorized use of vehicle - Full denial

decisions.name: N2_InsanityEmergency
decisions.description: Insanity or emergency situation - Full denial

decisions.name: N3_TheftPropertyDamage
decisions.description: Theft - Property damage after insurance terminated

decisions.name: N5_ExemptVehicleProperty
decisions.description: Exempt vehicle property damage - Full denial

decisions.name: N6_UnknownVehicleNoReport
decisions.description: Unknown vehicle without police report - Full denial

decisions.name: N7_NoInsuranceProperty
decisions.description: No insurance property damage - Full denial

decisions.name: N9_DrunkDriverSoleFault
decisions.description: Drunk driver sole fault - Full denial

decisions.name: N12_TheftPersonalInjury
decisions.description: Theft - Personal injury may be covered

decisions.name: N14_ExemptVehiclePersonalInjury
decisions.description: Exempt vehicle - Personal injury always covered

decisions.name: N16_NoInsurancePersonalInjury
decisions.description: No insurance - Personal injury from guarantee fund

decisions.name: N19_EScooterCompensation
decisions.description: Hired e-scooter driver injuries - Limited coverage (§34a)

metadata.note: Version 1.2 - Full hierarchical structure with ontology-aligned variable names
